BoardComponent
OnInit
export
BoardComponent

Implements: OnInit

Structure for chessboard

Note

This component uses an internal array of cells that is used to store.  I am working on transfering this over to a component system and eventually try to switch the generation over to have cell tracking with built-in Angular Directives.

Functions
addRow
addRow()

Returns a row with the first cell having primary style.

addRowAlt
addRowAlt()

Returns a row with the first cell having secondary style.
